mapper.update: update tl_school_homework set student_ID = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, subject = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teachername = #{teachername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classname = #{classname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, files = #{files,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where homework_id = #{homeworkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select homework_id, student_ID, subject, content, teachername, classname, end_time, files, create_time from tl_school_homework where homework_id = #{homeworkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select homework_id, student_ID, subject, content, teachername, classname, end_time, files, create_time from tl_school_homework
